blocks.title: Blocks
blocks.description: Nova nodes issue blocks to exchange data, including the information about token transactions. The higher readings could indicate a higher overall activity on the network.

dailyBlocks.title: Daily Blocks
dailyBlocks.description: How many blocks the network has issued in a day. The values are separated by the block payload type.

dailyBlockIssuer.title: Daily Block Issuers
dailyBlockIssuer.description: Tracks the number of registered and active Block Issuers in the network on a daily basis.

dailyTransactions.title: Daily Transactions
dailyTransactions.description: How many transactions the network has processed in a day. The values are separated between confirmed transactions and conflicting transactions (these were rejected).

outputs.title: Outputs
outputs.description: As transactions create new outputs and exhaust the old ones, the total amount of base tokens stays the same, but their owners change. Outputs of special types are also used for NFTs, foundries, and anchors.

totalOutputs.title: Total Outputs by Type
totalOutputs.description: How many outputs are there of each output type. The more special outputs there are, the more NFTs, native assets, and smart contract chains is there on the network.

totalTokens.title: Total Tokens by Output Type
totalTokens.description: The base token distribution by each output type on a given day. The base tokens that belong to outputs of the special types are mostly locked as security deposits.

addressesAndTokens.title: Addresses and Tokens
addressesAndTokens.description: Addresses own unspent outputs, and the sum of the tokens in these outputs makes the balance of the address. As each wallet has multiple addresses, and a person can have multiple wallets, this data does not represent the number of the Shimmer users, but it could correlate with it.

totalAddressesWithTokens.title: Total Addresses with Tokens
totalAddressesWithTokens.description: The total number of addresses that are referenced by unspent outputs, which is measured daily.

totalAddresses.title: Total Addresses with Tokens
totalAddresses.description: The total number of addresses that are referenced by unspent outputs, which is measured daily.

dailyActiveAddresses.title: Daily Active Addresses
dailyActiveAddresses.description: How many addresses sent or received a transaction in a day.

dailySentTokens.title: Daily Sent Tokens
dailySentTokens.description: The volume of transactions in base tokens in a day.

specialOutputsActivity.title: Special Outputs Activity
specialOutputsActivity.description: The activity on the network that is associated with things like minting and sending NFTs, or updating the state of an alias output.

dailyAnchorActivity.title: Daily Anchor Activity
dailyAnchorActivity.description: The daily activity over all anchor outputs. It counts the network changes that involve anchor outputs and group them by their nature: how many anchor outputs were created and destroyed, how many times governors changed, and how many times anchor states were updated.

dailyNftActivity.title: Daily NFT Activity
dailyNftActivity.description: The daily activity over all NFT outputs. It counts the network changes that involve NFT outputs and group them by their nature: how many NFT outputs were created and destroyed, and how many times had they change hands.

dailyAccountActivity.title: Daily Account Activity
dailyAccountActivity.description: The daily activity over all Account outputs. It counts the network changes that involve Account outputs and group them by their nature: how many Account outputs were created and destroyed, and how many times had they change hands.

dailyFoundryActivity.title: Daily Foundry Activity
dailyFoundryActivity.description: The daily activity over all Foundry outputs. It counts the network changes that involve Foundry outputs and group them by their nature: how many Founrdy outputs were created and destroyed, and how many times had they change hands.

dailyDelegationActivity.title: Daily Delegation Activity
dailyDelegationActivity.description: The daily activity over all Delegation outputs. It counts the network changes that involve Delegation outputs and group them by their nature: how many Delegation outputs were created and destroyed, and how many times had they change hands.

dailyValidatorsActivity.title: Daily Validators Activity
dailyValidatorsActivity.description: The daily activity over all Validators. It counts the total number of validators and candidates for validator committee.

dailyDelegatorsActivity.title: Daily Delegators Activity
dailyDelegatorsActivity.description: The daily activity over all Delegators. It counts the total number of delegators.

unlockConditions.title: Unlock Conditions
unlockConditions.description: Outputs can limit access to their associated tokens through unlock conditions. They are commonly used to relieve the old storage deposit with the tokens of the new owner, or to limit the output by the time when it is should be claimed.

totalUnlockConditions.title: Total Unlock Conditions
totalUnlockConditions.description: The total amount of outputs that have unlock conditions, by the condition type.

totalLockedTokens.title: Total Locked Tokens
totalLockedTokens.description: The total amount of base tokens that are locked by the unlock conditions, by the condition type.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.description: The statistics about the data storage on the network. The total storage is limited, but the more base tokens an output has, the more information it can store. This is called the storage deposit.

totalLedgerSize.title: Total Ledger Size
totalLedgerSize.description: The total size of the ledger, measured daily. The ledger presents the information as a structure of key-value pairs, and the graph separates the total amount of key bytes from the value bytes.

totalStorageDeposit.title: Total Storage Deposit
totalStorageDeposit.description: The total amount of base tokens that are locked as the storage deposit.

manaBurned.title: Mana Burned
manaBurned.description: The total amount of base tokens that are locked as the storage deposit.
